page_insights.title: Contact - How to Contact Us - Apple

recommendations.title: Optimize page titles
recommendations.description: Fix title issues on 1 pages. Ensure titles are 50-60 characters long and include relevant keywords.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
Page titles are crucial for SEO... Issues found:
- https://www.apple.com/: Title too short
recommendations.actionable_steps:
1. Identify the 1 page(s) with title issues from the list provided in 'Why This Matters'.
2. For each page, navigate to your website's content management system (CMS) or HTML editor.
3. Edit the <title> tag to be unique, descriptive, and between 50-60 characters.
4. Ensure the primary keyword for the page is included naturally within the title.
5. Save changes and request re-indexing via Google Search Console if necessary.

recommendations.title: Improve meta descriptions
recommendations.description: Fix meta description issues on 5 pages. Ensure descriptions are 120-160 characters and compelling.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
Meta descriptions improve click-through rates... Issues found:
- https://www.apple.com/: Missing meta description
- https://secure9.store.apple.com/shop/signIn/account?ssi=4AAABls2iikgBIEEfyvttghg5STwrxC2wvdxB_GRWtObdaRSMzhS6FXSPAAAANGh0dHBzOi8vc2VjdXJlOS5zdG9yZS5hcHBsZS5jb20vc2hvcC9hY2NvdW50L2hvbWV8fHwAAgF70tzIWc1BsZKPvrNnhqFQ4Ml3oYdMPM_O9ZxZPkya-A: Meta description too short
- https://www.apple.com/shop/bag: Meta description too short
... and more
recommendations.actionable_steps:
1. Locate the 5 page(s) with meta description issues.
2. In your CMS or HTML, edit the <meta name="description" content="..."> tag.
3. Write a compelling summary of the page content, 120-160 characters long.
4. Include relevant keywords naturally and a call-to-action if appropriate.
5. Ensure each meta description is unique across your site.

recommendations.title: Add missing alt text
recommendations.description: Add alt text to images on 2 pages for better accessibility and SEO.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
Alt text is crucial for accessibility and image SEO... Issues found:
- https://secure9.store.apple.com/shop/signIn/account?ssi=4AAABls2iikgBIEEfyvttghg5STwrxC2wvdxB_GRWtObdaRSMzhS6FXSPAAAANGh0dHBzOi8vc2VjdXJlOS5zdG9yZS5hcHBsZS5jb20vc2hvcC9hY2NvdW50L2hvbWV8fHwAAgF70tzIWc1BsZKPvrNnhqFQ4Ml3oYdMPM_O9ZxZPkya-A: Missing alt text on 2 images
- https://www.apple.com/shop/bag: Missing alt text on 2 images
recommendations.actionable_steps: 1. Identify images lacking alt text across 2 page(s) (approx. 4 images if reported per page). 2. For each image, add a descriptive 'alt' attribute in the tag. 3. The alt text should accurately describe the image content and context. 4. If an image is purely decorative, use an empty alt attribute (alt="").

recommendations.title: Improve content-to-HTML ratio
recommendations.description: Clean up HTML code on 5 pages to improve the text-to-code ratio.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
A low content-to-HTML ratio may suggest code bloat... Issues found:
- https://www.apple.com/: Content-to-HTML ratio of 3.33%
- https://secure9.store.apple.com/shop/signIn/account?ssi=4AAABls2iikgBIEEfyvttghg5STwrxC2wvdxB_GRWtObdaRSMzhS6FXSPAAAANGh0dHBzOi8vc2VjdXJlOS5zdG9yZS5hcHBsZS5jb20vc2hvcC9hY2NvdW50L2hvbWV8fHwAAgF70tzIWc1BsZKPvrNnhqFQ4Ml3oYdMPM_O9ZxZPkya-A: Content-to-HTML ratio of 0.36%
- https://www.apple.com/shop/bag: Content-to-HTML ratio of 0.64%
... and more
recommendations.actionable_steps:
1. Identify the 5 page(s) with low content-to-HTML ratio.
2. Review the HTML source of these pages to identify unnecessary code, comments, or inline styles.
3. Minify HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files where possible.
4. Ensure the main content of the page is substantial and not outweighed by code.

recommendations.title: Improve mobile-friendliness
recommendations.description: Optimize 5 pages for mobile devices by adding proper viewport tags and responsive design.
recommendations.detailed_reason:
Mobile-friendliness is crucial for ranking... Issues found:
- https://www.apple.com/: No 'Vary: User-Agent' header found
- https://secure9.store.apple.com/shop/signIn/account?ssi=4AAABls2iikgBIEEfyvttghg5STwrxC2wvdxB_GRWtObdaRSMzhS6FXSPAAAANGh0dHBzOi8vc2VjdXJlOS5zdG9yZS5hcHBsZS5jb20vc2hvcC9hY2NvdW50L2hvbWV8fHwAAgF70tzIWc1BsZKPvrNnhqFQ4Ml3oYdMPM_O9ZxZPkya-A: No 'Vary: User-Agent' header found
- https://www.apple.com/shop/bag: No 'Vary: User-Agent' header found
... and more
recommendations.actionable_steps:
1. Review the 5 page(s) with mobile-friendliness issues.
2. Ensure all pages have a <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"> tag.
3. Test pages using Google's Mobile-Friendly Test tool.
4. Ensure your web server sends the 'Vary: User-Agent' HTTP header if you serve different HTML to mobile users (less common now with responsive design).
5. Implement responsive web design principles so content adapts to all screen sizes.

positive_factors: Site appears responsive (mobile-friendly flag is true).
Good average page load time observed (1.61s).
Generally good internal linking structure observed.
improvement_areas: Improve image accessibility by adding descriptive alt text to images (2 instances found).
